divs: Sighting Detailssaw object following 4 engine plane , at 10 oclock postion on the horizon, object was disrubting the com trail behind plane. This is what made me aware of it. object looked to be 4 times larger han plane. object conntinued to follow plane for about 10 minutes, then slowly pulled beside plane, then left at high rate of speed. 2 other people wittness this event.
